title: Gifting centre
body: Is there a way to access the gifting centre online, or can it only be done through the client?

replies.body: The Gifting Center can only be accessed from within the client. Are you experiencing issues while trying to use it? Let me know if you need help.

Oh okay, thank you. I was just wondering if there was another way to access it, if for example I was going to gift someone a new skin but didn't have access to the client, thanks for letting me know :)
